research_municipality_step.notes: The City of Hudson, TX operates under a General Law Type A government, which is a mayor-council system. There was conflicting information regarding the current Mayor. The City of Hudson's official website explicitly states Robert Smith as the current Mayor, and he is also listed as Mayor under the 'Group Members' on the City Council page. Other sections of the city website and external directories listed Terry Taliaferro as Mayor. Robert Smith was chosen based on the most explicit and current statements on the official city website. Terry Taliaferro is listed as a Council Member on the current City Council group members list.
